1.content: Choose development approach and set up infrastructure
1.details: OPTION A - Fast WordPress Launch (2 weeks): Use WordPress + ListingPro/Directoria plugin for immediate launch, then rebuild later. OPTION B - Progressive React Deployment: Build basic React directory in Week 1, add features weekly. Get Supabase credentials and determine which approach to take.

2.details: Launch basic working directory with core features: 1) Search and filtering 2) Basic consultant profiles 3) Contact forms 4) Homepage with trust indicators 5) Simple admin panel for approving listings. Focus on getting something live that can collect consultants and generate leads immediately.

3.details: Progressive feature rollout: Week 2: Stripe payment system and membership tiers, Week 3: Consultant dashboards and analytics, Week 4: Quote request system and reviews. Include email notifications, GDPR compliance, backup strategy, and admin panel for managing everything.

4.details: Create all content including blog posts, static pages, and SEO elements. Ensure server-side rendering (if React), XML sitemaps, schema markup, and Core Web Vitals optimization. This can happen in parallel with development.
